I am getting this same error. I am using:
- Eclipse 3.2.2
- PDT 0.7 
- EMF 2.2.2
- GEF 3.2.2
- VE 1.2.1
- WST 1.5.3
- XSD (Runtime) 2.2.2

I also noticed that in the outline view, the "functions" element is not expandable. The outline and code assist used to work but then "just stopped". Not sure if its related, but the option to disable code folding is always reset to be true whenever I open a new PHP editor.

Sorry no reproducible steps. I tried clearing my configuration and starting again but that didn't work. Unfortuanatly my log file (and backup file) are too large and have wrapped so they only contain these NPEs and no useful information.

I just tried again and got the same error. This is what I did:

- download and install Eclipse 3.2.2
- apply appropriate patches and restart
- add PDT update site (and local mirror for Callisto releases)
- add both features from the PDT site
- add EMF 2.2.2
- hit "add required"
- Finish. Restart as required
- File -> Import -> projects from CVS
- dev.eclipse.org/cvsroot/org.eclipse/orbit
- opened ip_log_code.php
- turned off line numbers, quick diff, and folding via the context menu
- opened index.php
- noted that the folding was turned on again
- went back to the ip_log_code.php editor
- typed clos<ctrl-space>
- got the exception

This is my complete log file. (the debugger port error was because I had my old install open at the same time)
